channel.title: linux on AshLogs
channel.description: Recent content in linux on AshLogs

item.title: Postgres on Digital Ocean Droplet
item.description: Step-by-step guide to install and configure PostgreSQL on a Digital Ocean Ubuntu droplet, including user setup, remote access configuration, and network settings.

item.title: Introducing Nushell
item.description: Introduction to Nushell, a modern cross-platform shell written in Rust that treats everything as structured data. Compare traditional Bash workflows with Nushell's intuitive table-based approach.

item.title: How to switch between Nepali and English keyboard layouts in Linux
item.description: Configure romanized Nepali keyboard layout in Linux using setxkbmap. Works across GNOME, KDE, XFCE desktop environments on X11. Quick setup guide for switching between English and Nepali input.

item.title: How To Install Rust And The Linker It Requires On Linux
item.description: Quick guide to installing Rust on Linux including the required linker setup. Covers installation steps for both Arch-based and Debian-based distributions using rustup.

item.title: Alias Linux Command Explained succintly
item.description: Create custom Linux command shortcuts with alias. Learn to substitute strings for commands and boost your terminal productivity efficiently.

item.title: Linux Chmod command explained
item.description: Complete chmod tutorial: change file permissions in Linux using symbolic and octal notation. Master user, group, and other access controls.
